org.biosino.CHS.util
类 PreProcessor

java.lang.Object
  org.biosino.CHS.util.PreProcessor

public class PreProcessor
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for preprocess for genes.

字段摘要
 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer>> famNumMap
          The map from taxonomy name to family id to the number of genes belonging to the taxonomy and family.
 java.util.Map<Chromosome,java.util.List<Gene>> filteredChrMap
          The same as rankedChrMap, except that the genes with family id equivalent to nullFamID are deleted from the map.
 int geneMeanLen
          Average gene length.
 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> geneNumMap
          The map from taxonomy name to total gene number.
 boolean mergeTandem
          Indicating whether the tandem repeated genes in rankedChrMap are merged.
 int nullFamID
          The family id indicating a gene do not belong to any family (named null family).
 java.util.Map<Chromosome,java.util.List<Gene>> rankedChrMap
          The map from chromosomes to ranked gene lists.
 
构造函数摘要
PreProcessor(java.util.Map<Chromosome,java.util.List<Gene>> chrMap, boolean mergeTandem, int nullFamID)
          Create a new PreProcessor object and carry on all necessary preprocesses.
 
方法摘要
 
从类 java.lang.Object 继承的方法
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

字段详细信息

rankedChrMap

public java.util.Map<Chromosome,java.util.List<Gene>> rankedChrMap
The map from chromosomes to ranked gene lists. Tandem repeated genes are merged if mergeTandem is true.

filteredChrMap

public java.util.Map<Chromosome,java.util.List<Gene>> filteredChrMap
The same as rankedChrMap, except that the genes with family id equivalent to nullFamID are deleted from the map.

famNumMap

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer>> famNumMap
The map from taxonomy name to family id to the number of genes belonging to the taxonomy and family.

geneNumMap

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> geneNumMap
The map from taxonomy name to total gene number.

geneMeanLen

public int geneMeanLen
Average gene length.

mergeTandem

public boolean mergeTandem
Indicating whether the tandem repeated genes in rankedChrMap are merged.

nullFamID

public int nullFamID
The family id indicating a gene do not belong to any family (named null family).

构造函数详细信息

PreProcessor

public PreProcessor(java.util.Map<Chromosome,java.util.List<Gene>> chrMap,
                    boolean mergeTandem,
                    int nullFamID)
Create a new PreProcessor object and carry on all necessary preprocesses.

参数：
chrMap - original chromosome map with genes not ranked
mergeTandem - indicating whether tandem repeated genes should be merged
nullFamID - null family id
